name: HandymanPro
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Garage light”
”Alexa, turn on the TV”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With the "Handyman Pro" skill, you can control Handyman Smart Light Switch, Smart Cameras, Smart Plug and the other Handyman Smart Devices with your voice.

Simply enable the "Handyman Pro" skill in the Alexa app and link your Handyman account to get started.
(1) Download our "Handyman Pro" app in Android or IOS App Store.
(2) Register your account in "Handyman Pro" app.
(3) Prepare your Handyman Smart Devices.
(4) Install and configure the devices in "Handyman Pro" app.
(5) Download Amazon "Alexa" app in Android or IOS App Store.
(6) Configure Echo with "Alexa" app.
(7) Search "Handyman Pro" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category.
(8) Enable skill of "Handyman Pro", and you'll be navigated to "Handyman Pro" login page.
(9) Input your "Handyman Pro" app account and password, you'll be redirect to the success page.
(10) Now all setup is finished and ready to use the skill.

Voice commands for reference:
Handyman IR Remote Control
· Alexa, turn on Living Room TV
· Alexa, volume up on Living Room TV

Handyman Smart Light Switch & Smart Bulb
· Alexa, turn on the Garage light
· Alexa, dim the Living Room lights to 25%
· Alexa, turn off all lights
· Alexa, set lights to pink color

Handyman Smart Plug
· Alexa, turn on plug
· Alexa, turn off plug

Handyman Smart Robot Vacuum
· Alexa, turn on robot
· Alexa, turn off robot
